name: Fighting Fish
text: DON!! x1 When Attacking DON!! -1: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a Cost of 1 or lower.

effect.text: DON!! -1: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a Cost of 1 or lower.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' and has 'Nakamaru' watermark, likely a promotional or preview card. Rarity 'C' is confirmed by the box in bottom right.
